SHIZZLE MULTIPLAYER ONLINE GAME
AUTHOR: AYODELE OWOYELE
EMAIL: DSKYISNOTDLIMIT@HOTMAIL.COM
VERSION: 0.45
COPYRIGHT (2015)

GAME INSTRUCTIONS: Join letters together to form words.
Do this by dragging your hands (touchscreen) or
mouse on the screen. You cannot use a letter twice in 
the same word. You cannot play a word twice. 
The dictionary is the limit. Have fun!

You can send game requests to your friends.
They have to play first. After the other person
is done playing, then you will have access to
play the same game. The winner is determined.
Highscores are updated regularly.
